datasets.name: hpx_retention_dataset
queryLines:
WITH cohort_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', first_device_event_time) as cohort_month,
    device_id,
    MIN(first_device_event_time) as first_use_date
  FROM HPX_Retention_CSS_Analytics
  WHERE first_device_event_time >= '2023-05-01'
  GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', first_device_event_time), device_id
),
monthly_activity AS (
  SELECT
    cb.cohort_month,
    cb.device_id,
    r.months_since_first_use,
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.device_id) as is_active
  FROM cohort_base cb
  JOIN HPX_Retention_CSS_Analytics r ON cb.device_id = r.device_id
  GROUP BY cb.cohort_month, cb.device_id, r.months_since_first_use
),
cohort_size AS (
  SELECT
    cohort_month,
    COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) as total_devices
  FROM cohort_base
  GROUP BY cohort_month
),
retention_data AS (
  SELECT
    ma.cohort_month,
    ma.months_since_first_use,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ma.device_id) as active_devices,
    cs.total_devices
  FROM monthly_activity ma
  JOIN cohort_size cs ON ma.cohort_month = cs.cohort_month
  GROUP BY ma.cohort_month, ma.months_since_first_use, cs.total_devices
)
SELECT
  cohort_month,
  months_since_first_use,
  active_devices,
  total_devices,
  (active_devices * 100.0 / total_devices) as pct_devices_returning
FROM retention_data
ORDER BY cohort_month, months_since_first_use
